attributes.content: Mama? Mama, where are you going?
To the highlands? The flowery highlands?
But that’s where the bad man who hurt Papa is? Are you going to punish him?
Will that bring Papa back?
No?
Then... I don’t want you to go.
You have to go? But I don’t want you to go back to Ursus... The bread there is so hard. And winter is so cold.
Mama?
Mama...
Mama never came back either.
I used the money she left me to continue my studies in Ursus, and to live.
Alone.
I waited alone for years. I lived alone for years.
Until Dr. Kal'tsit appeared before me. She said she was the head of a research institute, and she came to get me.
Dr. Kal'tsit was tired then. Even more tired than she is now. I later learned she had just returned from some faraway place when she found me.
After that, I joined Rhodes Island.
I asked Dr. Kal'tsit where Mama went. She didn’t say much, just that Mama and Papa were together, buried deep inside Ursus.
She is my most respected teacher, my most honored leader. She guided me, educated me, not only with her words, but also through what she and her countless operators did for the Infected.
But the one thing Dr. Kal'tsit never did... was answer my simplest question...
On whom, or what, do I take my revenge?
Lisa, you don’t have to come with me.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: I’m worried.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: You shouldn’t be. I’m just going to look around and see if maybe there are some clues about that armed Infected group.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Do you think they’re behind it?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: I’m not sure. That’s the obvious answer, since we have no evidence.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: But with the town as it is, they’re the most likely suspects, aren’t they?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: And 'Winterwisp.' Severin wouldn’t say much about it, so I can’t be sure exactly what it means. But since they’re in cahoots with the militia group, they’re at the top of the list too.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: The mountain range near here is called the Winterwisp Mountains. It’s a barren place, covered with ice and snow year round... could that have to do with anything?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: I really don’t know. All I can say for sure is I have to find our murderer, and then pull my answers out of them.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Folinic, you’ve been really... scary. Since yesterday.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: I’m sorry, Lisa.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Not everyone is so easily calmed.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: This is the second time I’ve had to say goodbye to someone like that. And this time, I’m not leaving with regrets.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Come out. I won’t hurt you.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Aww. I like to think I’m pretty good at hiding. How did you see me?
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Hmm... Intuition? Let’s call it that...
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Who are you?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: (Oof. This guy seems like a pain in the ass.)
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: (Then stop talking to him.)
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: I’ve gone through some of Rhodes Island’s combat records. You’re no ordinary Infected.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Rhodes Island? So you are Rhodes Island Operators...?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: What do we do? Fight?
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: GreyThroat isn’t back yet... We have to stall him, at least.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Calm down. Don’t attack him. Click!
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Don’t do anything stupid!
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Gah! I- I’m sorry!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Hm...? Did I see your pupils flash red for a moment? Is that some kind of stress reaction?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Did I scare you? Sorry. I just wanted you two to know, you can’t fight me.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: If you are from Wolumonde, you’d better leave. It’s dangerous. If angry Winterwisps or Infected found you... You’d be in mortal danger.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Thanks for the warning.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: But why are you here?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: I just came to lay some flowers. And then I’ll leave.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Is that an ordinary wildflower you’re holding there?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: It’s cold here in the fall. I dream a lot... I dream of these flowers. They’re like the children of that snowy mountain... icy cold.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Rest in peace.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: (Did he really just come to pray? He wouldn’t just be using this as a cover for some kind of Originium Arts, would he?)
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: (With his face hidden, I can’t tell whether he’s lying or not. But...)
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: (He does seem genuinely sad.)
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Don’t move. Don’t turn around. Put your hands up.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: GreyThroat!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: When did you get here? You’re pretty smooth...
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Whatever. Your bolts can’t hurt me, Rhodes Island crossbowman.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: I said don’t move. I just want to ask you something.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: A conversation doesn’t reveal your strength... what’s the point?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Don’t say I didn’t warn you!
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Look. I’ve caught your bolt. You can’t put a scratch on me.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: He blocked her shot with a rock?!
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: N- no! It’s Arts! He actually 'caught' the bolt! With mud!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: At least you didn’t shoot without warning. I hate sneak attacks. You’re not so bad.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: And... Hm, if you wound up that second bolt... what would’ve happened?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: That depends on whether or not you have time to protect your neck with your Arts.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Hm... Even if I don’t, I do have a very thick suit of armor...
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Doesn’t matter. Since you have no intention of fighting to the death, I’ve had enough.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Can I go?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Sorry, but no.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: ...As expected. *Sigh*.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: So many Leithaniens have joined us, and our ranks have grown bountiful and diverse...
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: But... You, a crossbowman, you would not have missed this symbol. This is a symbol that once belonged to the Infected.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Reunion lit the fire that was, is, and will always be burning across all corners of Terra.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: But, Reunion does not represent all Infected.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: So, what about you? Are you from Leithania yourself? Or are you an exile who wandered here, weighed down by sin and intrigue?
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Me...? Hm... I guess so. Our aimless journey began in Kazdel. And we’ve been on the run ever since.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Wolumonde is a mess. And I’m sure you had something to do with it.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Right. There’s no way we wouldn’t.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: But I... am not Reunion either. Not anymore. I’m just the captain of Mudrock Squad. A... mercenary? No, let’s say I’m just an Infected.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: (Why does it seems like he’s always talking to himself? What kind of Reunion guy thinks like that?)
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: (Please be quiet while the team leader negotiates. If you really have nothing better to do, you can record it.)
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: (Oh yeah! Fire up the camera...)
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: But, really... What am I? I’m not a mercenary. I’m not Reunion. As things are now, I’m...
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Oh.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: My Arts dirtied the flowers... They’re so hard to find, this time of year.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: If you want to fight, can we do it somewhere else?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: You have a way with words... But no.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Click, Ayerscarpe, keep your guard up. But don’t attack him. Stay clear.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Roger.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Thanks.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: One of our operators seems to have gotten caught up in this fire. I need answers.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: My condolences, but... We also lost four of ours to the fire.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: We’re not so good with crime scene investigation or anything like that... But there are a lot of Leithaniens with us.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: They’ve all been educated, and they have a natural talent for Arts unlike people from other countries.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: At least... I am sure someone did this. And it was no accident.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Who?
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: If we knew, he’d already be dead and the town would be at peace.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Then tell me what you do know. Like, what was that Winterwisp you just mentioned?
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: I think you misunderstood. I am not your enemy. I’m only here to pay respects to my people.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: But maybe someday we will fight each other. I have no reason to... trust you, or share information with you.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: So that’s it then. But it doesn’t matter. I’ve gleaned a lot from your attitude alone.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: By the way, have you been to the town?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: What did you think of it?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: It’s a mess. The Infected have risen up in protest, and they’re fighting with the non-infected.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Your people whipped them into a frenzy.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: That’s not good. So many innocent people hurt... But...
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: But until Wolumonde admits its guilt, and until they hand over the murderer, there can’t be peace.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: How could I convince them to stop, when they’re outraged by the deaths of their people...?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: It sounds like things have spun out of your ability to control them.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Yes... More and more people keep getting sucked into it. Sooner or later, so will we...
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: We are not in a position to move around so easily, but you are.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Oh... I’ve said enough. I still can’t completely trust you, Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Right. Still not enough trust. So that’s it... goodbye.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: GreyThroat! That guy’s really scary! Even scarier than all those big Felines back at Rhodes Island!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: At least he wasn’t being very aggressive. But if he does have a whole squad with him... Wolumonde is in no condition to fight them.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: So we let him go?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: A direct attack is out of the question, and agitating them will only make Wolumonde’s situation worse. Not to mention, we still don’t know where Atro is.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: If this does have something to do with Reunion, things will be much more difficult.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Have we made contact with Operators Folinic and Suzuran?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: No. The town is so chaotic I was reluctant to even visit the town hall as an official representative of Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: But I found something very concerning. This doesn’t seem to be a typical Infected conflict.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: True. Leithania has always been rather gentle in its treatment of the Infected. Something very unusual must have happened to push things this far.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: That 'Winterwisp' is an important clue. We might have to investigate it further. Ayerscarpe, you come with me. Click, I’d like you to scout out their camp.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: We need to get a handle on the size of their team, and their modus operandi. Just a quick look. Carefully.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Roger!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: *Sigh*. If I’d known it would turn out like this, I would have stayed in the dormitory to watch Leonhardt play with rocks...
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Mmm——♪ Mmmhmm——♪
Winterwisp, oh, Winterwisp♪
Winterwisp? Where did you hear that word?
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: Who are you? Rhodes Island? Outlanders shouldn’t be meddling. This has nothing to do with you.
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: I don’t know of any 'Winterwisp.' Leave me alone.
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: Winterwisp? No, there are no Winterwisps in Wolumonde. Haven’t been for a long time.
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: A long time?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: No, I mean... Oh, I shouldn’t be talking to you.
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: Listen, I don’t care what it is you’re doing. But Wolumonde is a tighter community than you can imagine.
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: Most folks won’t even tell you this rule, but I’ll make an exception and explain it to you.
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: The 'Winterwisps' are part of Wolumonde’s history. But they’re a pretty controversial topic.
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: Seems to me there’s a big controversy over the 'Winterwisps' right now.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: You mean the power plant getting destroyed the other day? There’s worse than that...
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: Worse than leaving Wolumonde stranded in this wasteland in the dead of winter?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Wolumonde was hard-hit by the Catastrophe, and enduring the winter will be much more difficult.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Don’t get ahead of yourself, outsider. This issue is absolutely taboo. The noble lords come down hard. And I don’t want any trouble.
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: If you really want to know about the Winterwisps, go ask them yourselves.
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: Huh... How can we find a Winterwisp if we don’t know what it is? That doesn’t make any sense...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Enough!
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: Figure it out yourselves. I don’t know anything.
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: Hey...
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: He’s gone. Can you believe that guy?!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: A tight community? It is really tight-knit.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Maybe we should go ask Mr. Severin...?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Well, we did make a major breakthrough. I just hope he doesn’t dodge the subject like he did last time.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: But the sun is already going down...
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Blyat! How is it another day goes by and we’re still none the wiser?!
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Please calm down, Miss Folinic...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: I’m calm! I just... I...
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: There’s something wrong here... I know it... But Atro... She... What the hell am I going to do...?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: What can I do? Mama...
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Mmm——♪ Mmmhmm——♪
Such a brittle little branch~♪
Winterwisp, oh, Winterwisp♪
Weary of a long life, weary of a long death~♪
Sing out your song, firm and strong~♪
Singing through summer~♪
And on through winter~♪
Winterwisp, oh, Winterwisp♪
